function functionName(config, params, result) {    if (params.lastResponse) {        return { 'content': JSON.parse(result).url };    }    function md5_hlper() {        var hexcase = 0;  /* hex output format. 0 - lowercase; 1 - uppercase        */        var b64pad = ""; /* base-64 pad character. "=" for strict RFC compliance   */        var chrsz = 8;  /* bits per input character. 8 - ASCII; 16 - Unicode      */        this.hex_md5 = function (s) { return binl2hex(core_md5(str2binl(s), s.length * chrsz)); }        // function b64_md5(s) { return binl2b64(core_md5(str2binl(s), s.length * chrsz)); }        // function str_md5(s) { return binl2str(core_md5(str2binl(s), s.length * // function str_hmac_md5(key, data) { return binl2str(core_hmac_md5(key, data)); }        function core_md5(x, len) {            /* append padding */            x[len >> 5] |= 0x80 << ((len) % 32);            x[(((len + 64) >>> 9) << 4) + 14] = len;            var a = 1732584193;            var b = -271733879;            var c = -1732584194;            var d = 271733878;            for (var i = 0; i < x.length; i += 16) {                var olda = a;                var oldb = b;                var oldc = c;                var oldd = d;                a = md5_ff(a, b, c, d, x[i + 0], 7, -680876936);                d = md5_ff(d, a, b, c, x[i + 1], 12, -389564586);                c = md5_ff(c, d, a, b, x[i + 2], 17, 606105819);                b = md5_ff(b, c, d, a, x[i -1094730640);                a = md5_hh(a, b, c, d, x[i + 13], 4, 681279174);                d = md5_hh(d, a, b, c, x[i + 0], 11, -358537222);                c = md5_hh(c, d, a, b, x[i + 3], 16, -343485551);                a = safe_add(a, olda);                b = safe_add(b, oldb);                c = safe_add(c, oldc);                d = safe_add(d, oldd);            }            return Array(a, b, c, d);        }        function md5_cmn(q, a, b, x, s, t) {            return safe_add(bit_rol(safe_add(safe_add(a, q), safe_add(x, t)), s), b);        }        function md5_ff(a, b, c, d, x, s, t) {            return md5_cmn((b & c) | ((~b) & d), a, b, x, s, t);        }        function md5_gg(a, b, c, d, x, s, t) {            return md5_cmn((b & d) | (c & (~d)), a, b, x, s, t);        }        function md5_hh(a, b, c, d, x, s, t) {            return md5_cmn(b ^ c ^ d, a, b, x, s, t);        }        function md5_ii(a, b, c, d, x, s, t) {            return md5_cmn(c ^ (b | (~d)), a, b, x, s, t);        }        function core_hmac_md5(key, data) {            var bkey = str2binl(key);            if (bkey.length > 16) bkey = core_md5(bkey, key.length * chrsz);            var ipad = Array(16), opad = Array(16);            for (var i = 0; i < 16; i++) {                ipad[i] = bkey[i] ^ 0x36363636;                opad[i] = bkey[i] ^ 0x5C5C5C5C;            }            var hash = core_md5(ipad.concat(str2binl(data)), 512 + data.length * chrsz);            return core_md5(opad.concat(hash), 512 + 128);        }        function safe_add(x, y) {            var lsw = (x & 0xFFFF) + (y & 0xFFFF);            var msw = (x >> 16) + (y >> 16) + (lsw >> 16);            return (msw << 16) | (lsw & 0xFFFF);        }        function bit_rol(num, cnt) {            return (num << cnt) | (num >>> (32 - cnt));        }        function str2binl(str) {            var bin = Array();            var mask = (1 << chrsz) - 1;            for (var i = 0; i < str.length * chrsz; i += chrsz)                bin[i >> 5] |= (str.charCodeAt(i / chrsz) & mask) << (i % 32);            return bin;        }        function binl2str(bin) {            var str = "";            var mask = (1 << chrsz) - 1;            for (var i = 0; i < bin.length * 32; i += chrsz)                str += String.fromCharCode((bin[i >> 5] >>> (i % 32)) & mask);            return str;        }        function binl2hex(binarray) {            var hex_tab = hexcase ? "0123456789ABCDEF" : "0123456789abcdef";            var str = "";            for (var i = 0; i < binarray.length * 4; i++) {                str += hex_tab.charAt((binarray[i >> 2] >> ((i % 4) * 8 + 4)) & 0xF) +                    hex_tab.charAt((binarray[i >> 2] >> ((i % 4) * 8)) & 0xF);            }            return str;        }        function binl2b64(binarray) {            var tab = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";            var str = "";            for (var i = 0; i < binarray.length * 4; i += 3) {                var triplet = (((binarray[i >> 2] >> 8 * (i % 4)) & 0xFF) << 16)                    | (((binarray[i + 1 >> 2] >> 8 * ((i + 1) % 4)) & 0xFF) << 8)                    | ((binarray[i + 2 >> 2] >> 8 * ((i + 2) % 4)) & 0xFF);                for (var j = 0; j < 4; j++) {                    if (i * 8 + j * 6 > binarray.length * 32) str += b64pad;                    else str += tab.charAt((triplet >> 6 * (3 - j)) & 0x3F);                }            }            return str;        }    }    function parse_hlper(params) {        let md5 = new md5_hlper;        this.x_h2_001 = function (_0x52077e, _0x123226, _0x506f76, _0x1d48ce) {            if (_0x1d48ce % 0x5 == 0x0) {                h2_bbe = 'c004346168e1cexs';            } else if (_0x1d48ce % 0x3 == 0x0) {                h2_bbe = '2h32ke9sj031a35l';            } else if (_0x1d48ce % 0x2 == 0x1) {                h2_bbe = '1xcxcebcj0s1a3a1'            } else {                h2_bbe = 'd3cxf826xxcs94bx'            }            return md5.hex_md5((((_0x123226 + _0x52077e) + _0x1d48ce) + _0x506f76) + h2_bbe);        }        this.x_h2_002 = function (_0x289845, _0x4ce9f2, _0x4b97b2, _0x23f2e3, k1) {            return md5.hex_md5((((_0x4ce9f2 + _0x289845) + _0x23f2e3) + _0x4b97b2) + k1);        }    }    let xparse = new parse_hlper;    let k1 = String(result.match(/eval\(\"[a-zA-Z0-9\\]+/g)).replace("eval(\"", "").split("\\");    let res_k1 = new Array();    for (let xx = 1; xx < k1.length; xx++) {        k1[xx] = k1[xx].replace('x', '');        res_k1 += String.fromCharCode(parseInt(k1[xx], 16))    }    k1 = String(res_k1).replace("$('#k1').val('", "").replace("');", "").substring(0, 0x10);    eval(String(result.match(/var page_param.(\S*?)[^\}]*}.*?/g)).replace(/document.domain/g, "\"x\"") + ";page_param");    let GetPageDataUrl = "https://vip.qianyicp.com/vip_a/api/api.php";    let httpHeaders = {        "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest",        "Accept": "application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01",        "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8",        "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/95.0.4638.54 Safari/537.36",    }    let key1 = xparse.x_h2_001(page_param.key1, page_param.url, page_param.time * 9, page_param.time);    let key2 = xparse.x_h2_002(page_param.key2, page_param.url, page_param.time * 8, page_param.time, k1);    let xmd5 = xparse.x_h2_001(page_param.key1, page_param.time * 2, page_param.time, page_param.time);    let httpParams = {        "apiname": "api/api.php",        "wap": "",        "time": page_param.time,        "url": page_param.url,        "key1": key1,        "key2": key2,        "md5": xmd5,    };    return {
        'cacheKey': String(new Date().getTime()),        'autoRequestMore': true,        'more': true,        'success': true,        'url': GetPageDataUrl,        'httpHeaders': httpHeaders,        'httpParams': httpParams,        'POST': true    };}

searchBook.author: //p[@class="figure_cast"]

chapterList.JSParser: function functionName(config, params, result) {    eval(String(result.match(/var COVER_INFO [\u4e00-\u9fa5a-zA-Z0-9\s\S]+}\nvar COLUMN_INFO/g)).replace("\nvar COLUMN_INFO", ";"));    let cid = COVER_INFO.cover_id;    let count = 0;//预告计数    let x_res = COVER_INFO.vip_ids.map((x, i) => {        // F:7 需要VIP        // F:2 无需VIP        // F:4 预告        // F:0 预告        let swx = x.F == 2 || x.F == 7;        !swx ? count++ : undefined;        let x_url = "https://v.qq.com/x/cover/" + cid + "/" + x.V + ".html";        return { "title": "第[" + ((i + 1) - (swx ? count : 0)) + (swx ? "]集" : "]集预告"), "url": x_url };    });    return { 'list': x_res };}
